data.description: As a Hologic Co-op, you are not just taking a job; you are taking your place on a global team of motivated, creative, and amazing people! The co-op experience gives you the opportunity to shine and share your knowledge, energy, and passion on meaningful projects that impact people all over the world. The R&D Engineering team is part of the Surgical Research and Development at Hologic. This team is responsible for the research and development of our current Fluent, NovaSure and Assessa products as well as future product development in the area of women's health. The student selected for this role will help with software development tasks and testing associated with the existing devices and future products. The chosen candidate will learn the process of Medical Device design, development, testing, and the importance of documentation.
